movies.title: SK1
movies.plot: An investigation by a young inspector who quickly becomes obsessed with stopping a monster.
movies.simplePlot: An investigation by a young inspector who quickly becomes obsessed with stopping a monster.

biography.bio: Raphaël Personnaz is an actor and director, known for The French Minister (2013), Une nouvelle amie (2014) and SK1 (2014).
biography.name: Raphaël Personnaz

biography.bio: Nathalie Baye was born on July 6, 1948 in Mainneville, Eure, Upper Normandy, France. She is an actress, known for Catch Me If You Can (2002), Laurence Anyways (2012) and It's Only the End of the World (2016).
biography.name: Nathalie Baye

biography.bio: Grandson of a carpenter, Olivier Gourmet grew up in Mirwart, a Belgian village where his father was a cattle dealer and mother the manager of a family hotel-restaurant. At 13, he was sent to boarding school, which was an unhappy experience that led him to "be closed in on myself". It was at this school that he began acting when he replaced a classmate at short notice in the school play. He discovered a talent for mimicry and comedy. Later he was torn between a career in sports journalism or comedy. He opted for acting and comedy and attended the Conservatoire de Liège where he won first prize after only two years. In 1996 he enjoyed his first significant role in a Dardenne brothers' film, The Promise. Since then Gourmet has featured in every film from the Dardennes. His performance in their film The Son earned him a Cannes Jury prize for interpretation in 2002. He is a much sought after actor with an extensive filmography making, on average five films per year. Internationally regarded as the one of greatest actors with staggering performances in a wide range of roles full of charismatic qualities and insights, he has also received the Critics Award at the Cannes festival in 2011 and in 2012 he was nominated in eleven categories at the Césars! Olivier has been married to Catherine since age 19 and they have two children, Louis and Juliette. After his mother suffered a stroke, the family returned to Mirwart to manage the hotel-restaurant with Olivier's wife leaving her advertising career.
biography.name: Olivier Gourmet

biography.bio: Michel Vuillermoz was born in 1963 in Orléans, Loiret, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Atonement (2007), Midnight in Paris (2011) and A Very Long Engagement (2004).
biography.name: Michel Vuillermoz

biography.bio: Adama Niane was born on August 23, 1966 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France as Adama Samba Niane. He is an actor, known for Rape Me (2000), SK1 (2014) and 35 Shots of Rum (2008).
biography.name: Adama Niane

biography.bio: Christa Théret was born on June 25, 1991 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for Lol (2008), Renoir (2012) and The Ax (2005).
biography.name: Christa Théret

biography.bio: Thierry Neuvic was born on August 3, 1970 in Montreuil, Seine-Saint-Denis, France. He is an actor, known for Hereafter (2010), Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows (2011) and Code Unknown (2000).
biography.name: Thierry Neuvic

biography.bio: William Nadylam is an actor and producer, known for Kirikou and the Sorceress (1998), White Material (2009) and Tout le monde descend (1997).
biography.name: William Nadylam

biography.bio: Marianne Denicourt was born on May 14, 1966 in Paris, France as Marianne Cuau. She is an actress, known for La belle noiseuse (1991), Sade (2000) and Up, Down, Fragile (1995).
biography.name: Marianne Denicourt

biography.bio: Chloé Stefani is an actress, known for Henri 4 (2010), SK1 (2014) and La femme cachée (2012).
biography.name: Chloé Stefani

biography.bio: François Rabette is an actor, known for The Family (2013), SK1 (2014) and Un homme idéal (2015).
biography.name: François Rabette

biography.bio: Anthony Paliotti is an actor and director, known for Mr. Bean's Holiday (2007), Ce qu'il restera de nous (2012) and Victoria (2016).
biography.name: Anthony Paliotti

biography.bio: Olivier Balazuc is an actor and writer, known for La tour Montparnasse infernale (2001), Le personnage (2005) and SK1 (2014).
biography.name: Olivier Balazuc

biography.bio: Hubert Delattre is an actor, known for Zone blanche (2017), SK1 (2014) and Zim and Co. (2005).
biography.name: Hubert Delattre

biography.bio: Maxime Bailleul is known for his work on Un ciel bleu presque parfait (2016), SK1 (2014) and Ovo (2012).
biography.name: Maxime Bailleul
